## resolveDynamicContext() function

Find dynamic context generating functions and return their results to be merged into the static contexts Combine an array of unchanging contexts with the result of a context-creating function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function resolveDynamicContext(dynamicOrStaticContexts?: DynamicContext | null, ...extraParams: any[]): Array<SelfDescribingJson>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dynamicOrStaticContexts | DynamicContext \| null | Array of custom context Objects or custom context generating functions |
|  extraParams | any\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;SelfDescribingJson&gt;

An array of Self Describing JSON context
